last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: Just has lied about the death of Emilie's mother and it transpires that Sofie and Sebastian's absolution from the curse will have grave consequences for his family. Which side will Emilie take?

name: Heartless
overview: Heartless follows Sofie and Sebastian - two siblings with a deep dark and fatal secret. In order to survive they must suck energy out of other people. We follow their quest for answers as to why they are this way and their search leads them to Ottmannsgaard, a boarding school with plenty of deep dark secrets of its own.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Sofie and Sebastian carry a deep dark secret. They sign up as students at Ottman's Boarding School in their search for answers, but it's not easy being a student when you are different.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The twins discover why their mother went to the boarding school, but the curse remains. Nadja wants Sebastian at any cost. Ditlev picks Sofie as his victim in the initiation ceremony for new students.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Sebastian and Sofie discover some old paintings and that they are connected to the secrets of their past.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Ditlev's death shocks the school. Just convinces the police that it was suicide, but he knows better and starts his own investigation to identify the murderer.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Sebastian wants Sofie to exploit her relationship with Emilie to get information. The twins are forced to take drastic action against Nadja, while Just tells his daughters about their family secret.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The twins find some graves in the forest and wonder whether they're connected to the curse. Emilie uncovers Sofie's secret, testing their relationship. Just intensifies his search for the black-eyes.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: As the twins realise there may be other black-eyes at the school, Just reveals how far he is willing to go to fight them. Meanwhile, the hunt for the gold heart intensifies, with fatal consequences.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Just has lied about the death of Emilie's mother and it transpires that Sofie and Sebastian's absolution from the curse will have grave consequences for his family. Which side will Emilie take?
